data_table.description: Access and Quality of Care, Visit 5. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Access and Quality of Care]

variable.name: AQC2
variable.description: Q2. A. Health insurance coverage and utilization. Additional health care coverage [Access and Quality of Care]

variable.name: AQC3A
variable.description: Q3a. A. Health insurance coverage and utilization. Health care coverage: private health insurance [Access and Quality of Care]

variable.name: AQC3B
variable.description: Q3b. A. Health insurance coverage and utilization. Health care coverage: Medigap [Access and Quality of Care]

variable.name: AQC3C
variable.description: Q3c. A. Health insurance coverage and utilization. Health care coverage: Medicaid [Access and Quality of Care]

variable.name: AQC3D
variable.description: Q3d. A. Health insurance coverage and utilization. Health care coverage: Veteran Administration [Access and Quality of Care]

variable.name: AQC3E
variable.description: Q3e. A. Health insurance coverage and utilization. Health care coverage: Tricare Or Champva [Access and Quality of Care]

variable.name: AQC3F
variable.description: Q3f. A. Health insurance coverage and utilization. Health care coverage: State-Sponsored Health Plan [Access and Quality of Care]

variable.name: AQC3G
variable.description: Q3g. A. Health insurance coverage and utilization. Health care coverage: Other Government Health Care Program [Access and Quality of Care]

variable.name: AQC3H
variable.description: Q3h. A. Health insurance coverage and utilization. Health care coverage: Single Service Health Care Plan [Access and Quality of Care]

variable.name: AQC4
variable.description: Q4. B. Usual source of care. Have regular health professional or clinic [Access and Quality of Care]
variable.value: No, because I have lots of health problems and see many providers
No, because I do notuse health care services much and, or do not have a regular provider

variable.name: AQC5
variable.description: Q5. B. Usual source of care. Kind of health care place or provider most visited [Access and Quality of Care]
variable.value: A specialist for a medical problem
Health center/ambulatory care center/hospital outpatient with wide range of providers

variable.name: AQC6
variable.description: Q6. B. Usual source of care. Transportation to most visited health care place or provider [Access and Quality of Care]
variable.value: Health care provider usually comes to home

variable.name: AQC7
variable.description: Q7. B. Usual source of care. Health care provider with night or weekend hours [Access and Quality of Care]

variable.name: AQC8
variable.description: Q8. B. Usual source of care. Difficulty to get appointment on short notice [Access and Quality of Care]

variable.name: AQC9
variable.description: Q9. B. Usual source of care. Difficulty to talk over phone to provider [Access and Quality of Care]

variable.name: AQC10
variable.description: Q10. C. Difficulty in obtaining care. Delayed getting care [Access and Quality of Care]

variable.name: AQC11A
variable.description: Q11a. C. Difficulty in obtaining care. In the past 12 months unable to afford being seen by doctor [Access and Quality of Care]

variable.name: AQC11B
variable.description: Q11b. C. Difficulty in obtaining care. In the past 12 months unable to afford mental health care [Access and Quality of Care]

variable.name: AQC11C
variable.description: Q11c. C. Difficulty in obtaining care. In the past 12 months unable to afford nursing home care [Access and Quality of Care]

variable.name: AQC12A
variable.description: Q12a. C. Difficulty in obtaining care. In the past 12 months unable to get medical care through on the telephone [Access and Quality of Care]

variable.name: AQC12B
variable.description: Q12b. C. Difficulty in obtaining care. In the past 12 months unable to get appointment soon enough [Access and Quality of Care]

variable.name: AQC12C
variable.description: Q12c. C. Difficulty in obtaining care. In the past 12 months wait too long to see doctor [Access and Quality of Care]

variable.name: AQC12D
variable.description: Q12d. C. Difficulty in obtaining care. In the past 12 months clinic was not open [Access and Quality of Care]

variable.name: AQC12E
variable.description: Q12e. C. Difficulty in obtaining care. In the past 12 months no transportation to get health care [Access and Quality of Care]

variable.name: AQC12F
variable.description: Q12f. C. Difficulty in obtaining care. In the past 12 months medical care was too far away[Access and Quality of Care]

variable.name: AQC13A
variable.description: Q13a. D. Health care satisfaction. In the past 12 months, how often did doctors or other health providers: providers listened carefully [Access and Quality of Care]

variable.name: AQC13B
variable.description: Q13b. D. Health care satisfaction. In the past 12 months, how often did doctors or other health providers: providers explained procedures and tests clearly [Access and Quality of Care]

variable.name: AQC13C
variable.description: Q13c. D. Health care satisfaction. In the past 12 months, how often did doctors or other health providers: providers showed respect [Access and Quality of Care]

variable.name: AQC13D
variable.description: Q13d. D. Health care satisfaction. In the past 12 months, how often did doctors or other health providers: providers spent enough time [Access and Quality of Care]

variable.name: AQC14
variable.description: Q14. D. Health care satisfaction. Level of satisfaction with quality of care [Access and Quality of Care]

variable.name: AQC0AY
variable.description: Year of completion date [Access and Quality of Care]
